text: Anankema nentahino'a Israeli kini ne' Joasi'a amanage huno fronka kea Juda kini nera asami'ne, Lebanoni zafafinti ave'ave trazamo'a Lebanoni zafafi sida zafagura huno, nenamofona mofaka'a amigeno a' erinteno hu'ne. Hianagi Lebanoni zafafinti afi'zagamo eno ana ave'ave trazana eme repri'geno haviza hu'ne.
